Recommendations.Title: Free school meals
Key Strengths: Specifically provides information on free school meals
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link directly leads to the council's website and specifically discusses free school meals. It seems to be the most relevant resource for customers seeking information about council-supported free school meals.

Recommendations.Title: Free School Meals

Details eligibility criteria and benefits for free school meals

Recommendations.Title: Healthy Holidays - school holiday activities and food programme

Recommendations.Title: Healthy Holidays clubs

Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource discusses a program that offers free places to children who receive benefit-related free school meals, although it is not as clearly focused on council-supported resources as some other options.

Analysis Notes: All ten items are relevant to some extent, but the first five have significantly stronger connections to the customer's information needs regarding council services and free school meals.
Recommendations Notes: While item 10 discusses Healthy Holidays clubs for children who receive benefit-related free school meals, it is more focused on booking rather than providing detailed information about the service. Although relevant, other recommendations are considered more suitable for customers seeking council-supported resources.
